memberdef.name: seven_segment_symbols
memberdef.initializer: = {ZERO, ONE, TWO, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, SIX, SEVEN, EIGHT, NINE, LET_A, LET_A, LET_B, LET_B, LET_C, LET_C, LET_D, LET_D, LET_E, LET_E, LET_F, LET_F, LET_G, LET_G, LET_H, LET_H, LET_I, LET_I, LET_J, LET_J, LET_L, LET_L, LET_N, LET_N, LET_O, LET_O, LET_P, LET_P, LET_Q, LET_Q, LET_R, LET_R, LET_S, LET_S, LET_T, LET_T, LET_U, LET_U, LET_Y, LET_Y, SYM__, SYM_DASH, SYM_BACK, SYM_FRWD}

briefdescription.para: Clears the character from position n from the buffer.
Sets character in position n of the buffer.
Sets word of length c in the buffer.
Updates the refresh rate of the display.
Updates the brightness of the display.

parameterdescription.para: brightness: int between one and nine

briefdescription.para: Sets n as the starting print position for the buffer.
Turns on the decimal point of the nth seven segment.
Turns off the decimal point of the nth seven segment.
Toggles the decimal point of the nth seven segment.
